title: The Launchpad
problem: The provider directory looked polished but delivered no measurable pipeline. Renewals wavered because practitioners could not see ROI.
solution: Repositioned the directory as a conversion engine with embedded lead capture, behavioural scoring, and automation that nurtured prospects the moment they signalled intent.
outcome: Qualified leads jumped 212%, lead-to-demo conversions grew 38%, and the relaunch produced $310K in new revenue within six months.

title: The Guardian
problem: Customers were anxious about compliance, flooding support with repeated questions. Agents had no reliable system to personalise responses or recommend upgrades.
solution: Centralised state rules, layered personalised automations, and built an authenticated experience that answered compliance questions instantly while surfacing relevant offers.
outcome: Compliance inquiries dropped 68%, 92% of questions are solved in under 30 seconds, and tailored upgrade prompts lifted advanced course conversions by 27%.

title: The Compass
problem: Marketing, finance, and product teams operated from conflicting data. Attribution was guesswork and growth decisions stalled.
solution: Engineered a governed analytics pipeline that unifies event tracking, ecommerce transactions, and CRM states into dashboards the entire company trusts.
outcome: Attribution accuracy improved 46 percentage points, CAC efficiency rose 32%, and leadership now plans campaigns on instrumentation-grade insights.

title: The Fortress
problem: Persistent bot attacks strained the storefront, slowed checkout, and introduced security risk at the exact moments revenue peaked.
solution: Shifted security to the edge with Cloudflare WAF, bot mitigation, surgical rate limiting, and observability that catches anomalies before customers feel them.
outcome: Blocked more than 85K malicious hits per month, increased cache hit ratio to 86%, and improved conversion-critical page speed by 210%.

title: The Conductor
problem: WooCommerce, LearnDash, Gravity Forms, and the CRM all told different stories. Teams wasted days reconciling spreadsheets.
solution: Built a unified pipeline that synchronises purchases, learning progress, and customer state in real time while powering automation for every team.
outcome: Saved 48 hours of manual work every week, achieved 99.8% data accuracy, and gave leadership real-time dashboards that focus conversations on action.

title: The Engine Room
problem: The flagship ecommerce platform was slow, brittle, and risky to deploy—limiting growth and stressing every launch.
solution: Rebuilt the infrastructure with tuned servers, automated CI/CD, deep observability, and queue-based processing for heavy tasks.
outcome: Average page load dropped from 5.8 seconds to 1.2 seconds, checkout failures fell 92%, and the team now deploys daily with a 99% confidence score.
